no-internet-connection.title: Can't Reach the Internet
no-internet-connection.body: Your internet connection has become unavailable. Please reestablish an internet connection and tap the Reload button.

welcome.description: A secure cryptocurrency made for your world

phone-number.title: Enter phone number

phone-number.phoneCorrect: Is your phone number above correct?
phone-number.errorUserDisabled: Your user account has been disabled.

sign-up.title: Sign up
sign-up.headingReferral: Welcome! you have been invited by {{sponsor}} to be part of UR Money.
sign-up.headingNoReferral: Welcome. To be part of UR network, you have to enter your sponsor's referral code
sign-up.headingEmail: Please confirm your country, enter your phone number and your email
sign-up.subheadingButtonReferal: Sign up with referral code instead
sign-up.userAlreadyExists: This phone number already exists on our records, please go to sign in page
sign-up.sponsorNotFoundMessage: There is no sponsor with that referral code, please try another referral code
sign-up.sponsorDisabledMessage: The sponsor is disabled, please try another referral code
sign-up.alertInfoReferral: You need your sponsor's referral code in order to sign up. Please, ask the referral code to your sponsor or click on the invitation link that was sent to you.
sign-up.alertInfoEmail: If you joined our beta program, enter that email.

choose-contact.title: Choose contact or enter UR address

email-address.title: Enter email address
email-address.heading: Please enter the email address that you have registered in the UR Money Beta Program
email-address.errorUserDisabled: Your user account has been disabled.
email-address.unexpectedProblem: There was an unexpected problem sending you an email. Please try again later
email-address.noInviteFoundMessage: We were not able to find an invitation associated with your phone number. If you signed up with the UR Money Beta Program, please click the button 'I'm in the UR Money Beta' Program below.
email-address.betaProgramButton: I'm in the UR Money Beta Program
email-address.errorUserNotInBetaProgram: We do not have a record of that email being registered in our beta program.
email-address.unexpectedProblem: There was an unexpected problem sending the email. Please try again later

authentication-code.title: Verification code
authentication-code.heading1: We have sent you an SMS with a verification code.
authentication-code.heading2: To complete your phone number verification, please enter the 6-digit verification code.
authentication-code.resendCode: Didn't receive verification code? Send again
authentication-code.unableToProcessCode: We were unable to process your verification code. Please try again later
authentication-code.invalidCode: The verification code you entered is incorrect or expired. Please try again.

intro.title: Set Up Profile
intro.notReadyMessage: Since identity verification is required for the use of the UR Money app, you will need to sign out for now. Are you sure you want to sign out?
intro.message1: Congratulations! We are processing your 2,000 UR bonus!
intro.message2: You will be able to receive and send UR to your friends and family soon.
intro.message3: We will also need access to your contacts so you can invite them, chat with them and make transactions with them.
intro.message4: You are all done. <b>Enjoy UR Money!<b/>

identity-verification-intro.slideTitle: You’re just a few steps away from claiming your 2,000 UR!
identity-verification-intro.slideMessage: In order to provide a safe environment, we ask all community members to verify their identity. To do this, we will need to ask you for several pieces of identifying information including mobile phone number, name, address, date of birth, etc., and then share this info with Trulioo, Inc., a Canada-based identity verification service.
identity-verification-intro.costToBuy: The cost of verifying the identity will be {{value}}
identity-verification-intro.verificationPurchased: You have already bought the verification. Please, continue to verify your identity.

identity-verification-address.placeholderBuildingNumber: Enter your building or house number
identity-verification-address.placeholderStreetName: Enter the name of the street
identity-verification-address.placeholderStreeType: Enter the type of the street
identity-verification-address.placeholderPostal: Enter your zip or postal code

identity-verification-document.placeholderMRZ1: Enter the passport Machine Readable Zone line 1
identity-verification-document.placeholderMRZ2: Enter the passport Machine Readable Zone line 2

identity-verification-finish.slideMessage: You will see your 2,000 UR bonus in your homepage soon!

identity-verification-sponsor-wait.slideTitle: Waiting for sponsor to complete profile setup
identity-verification-sponsor-wait.slideMessage:
We are currently waiting for {{value}} to complete their account before you can get your 2000 UR.
Your bonus will be generated soon.
identity-verification-sponsor-wait.title: Waiting sponsor to complete account

profile-setup.title: Set Up Profile
profile-setup.name: Name as it will appear to others
profile-setup.placeholderFullName: Enter how you want to be called

wallet-setup.title: Secret Phrase Setup
wallet-setup.confirmWrittenDownMessage2: Write this phrase on a piece of paper and store it in a safe place.
wallet-setup.confirmWrittenDownMessage3: WARNING: UR Technology does not store your secret phrase on our servers and will NOT be able to recover it if it is lost, forgotten or corrupted.
wallet-setup.reenterSecretPhraseMessage: Please confirm your secret phrase by re-entering it.
wallet-setup.youWillReceiveBonus: You will receive your 2,000 UR bonus soon!
wallet-setup.message1: Make sure you remember it because you will need it to make transactions later.
wallet-setup.message2: Only you know it. It can never be recovered if lost.
wallet-setup.message3: It’s a string of words that’s never appeared in print or online—ever!
wallet-setup.message4: You can use the Generate button below to automatically generate a secret phrase.
wallet-setup.learnSavePhrase: By checking this box, you are choosing to store your your secret phrase on your device. This approach to safeguarding your secret phrase has advantages and disadvantages. The main advantage is that, if your forget your secret phrase and also lose your written copy of it, you will usually be able to recover it using this approach. The main disadvantage is that you could increase the chances of having your secret phrase stolen if someone gets physical or remote access to your device. Furthermore, saving your secret phrase to your device is NOT 100% reliable, so please continue to write down your secret phrase and store it in a safe place.
wallet-setup.saveSecretPhrase: Store a copy of your secret phrase on device for emergencies?

verification-pending.title: Verification pending
verification-pending.message: Thank you for submitting your verification request. Most requests are processed within 72 hours. We will notify you via text message when we are finished processing your request.

verification-failed.title: Verification Failed
verification-failed.message:
We're sorry. We were unable to verify your identity.
If you have any questions about your failed identity verification, contact us via email at support@ur.technology
When you contact us please provide us with your name, address, and any other information we may need to identify you.

announcement-initiated.title: Bonus generation in progress
announcement-initiated.message: Bonus transaction may take a few hours to show up in your account, please be patient.

country-not-supported.title: UR Money
country-not-supported.message: Thank you for your interest in UR money. When we launch in your country, we will notify you.

contacts.toastMessage: Pick an app and type a message. Or you can paste the simple message that we've placed in your clipboard.
contacts.messageNoContacts: It looks like you don't have contacts yet. Invite a friend
contacts.messageContactNotPresent: Contact not in list? Invite a friend
contacts.sorryInvitesDisabled: Sorry, invites are disabled for this account.

transaction.inviteFriends: Invite your friends and get more UR

send.title: Send UR
send.incorrectSecretPhrase: The secret phrase you entered was not correct.
send.numberOutOfRange: Amount must be between 0.000000000000000001 and max amount.

invite-link.title: Invite Friends
invite-link.explanation1: The more of your friends who join UR Money, the more UR you can earn.
invite-link.explanation2: To get credit for referring your friends, send the personalized link below using your favorite social network or messaging app.

about.heading: About UR
about.urCurrency: UR is an advanced cryptocurrency made for everyday people and everyday expenditures. 2,000 UR is distributed to every human being who chooses to join the UR community and proves his or her identity. There is no cost to join or to receive this distribution. UR community members may earn additional UR by referring other members and for helping to support the integrity, security, and usefulness of UR currency and the UR community.
about.urTechnologyInc: UR Technology Inc. is a company whose mission is to create a secure, stable, and useful world currency available to every human being.
about.feedbackPart1: To send us feedback on on the UR Money app (bugs, feature requests, etc.), please join our slack team by visiting
about.feedbackPart2: and send us a message in the #ur-money-feedback channel, or send us an email at
about.abuse: To report abuse by other members, please send us an email at
about.learnMore: To learn more about UR, and UR Technology visit us at

noInternetConnection: No internet connection available. Please try again later.
unexpectedErrorMessage: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.
